hr.vestigo.java.tecaj.zadaca3

Class Main.FootballGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.vestigo.java.tecaj.zadaca3.Main.FootballGame
  • Enclosing class:
    Main

    public static class Main.FootballGame
extends java.lang.Object
    A nested FootballGame class which runs all the necessary calculations. The class contains a method playGame which will run the calculations. the playGame method is called upon initializing an instance of FootballGame class.
    Author:
    Šimun

    • Constructor Detail

      • FootballGame

        public FootballGame()
        Constructor of class. When called, it will run the playGame method.

    • Method Detail

      • playGame

        public void playGame()
        Method playGame which runs the calculations. It checks that both teams have correct attack and defense stats. Then it determines the winning team and the team with most exclusions (hrv. iskljuèenje, nisam siguran u prijevod). It then prints the winning team, number of goals and exlusions and whether they had more or less exlusions then the other team. In case of a tie, it will print number of goals of both teams and a team with more exlusions, with number of exlusions listed.
